An explanation of machine learning models even you could understand
I will start out by explaining what machine learning is, along with the different types of machine learning, and then I will jump into explaining common models. I won’t go into any of the math, but I am considering doing that in another article in the future. Enjoy! Machine learning is when you load lots of data into a computer program and ...
